articles.title: WHO says no evidence monkeypox virus has mutated - Reuters
articles.description: The World Health Organization does not have evidence that the monkeypox virus has mutated, a senior executive at the U.N. agency said on Monday, noting the infectious disease that is endemic in west and central Africa has tended not to change.
